title: How to watch 'Predator: Badlands' at home digitally ahead of its February 4K Blu-ray release
description: Predator: Badlands has landed on digital platforms ahead of the February 4K Blu-ray release, but still no word on the Hulu streaming release date.
content: Predator: Badlands has landed on digital platforms ahead of the February 4K Blu-ray release, but still no word on the Hulu streaming release date.
